bropals.lib.simplegame.io

Class PropertiesReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.io.PropertiesReader

  • public class PropertiesReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads text files that are in property, value format. The format for these files is

    property=value
    property=value
    ...

        public PropertiesReader()

    • Method Detail

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties(java.io.File file)
        Clears the current property-value data and replaces it with the newly read data from the given file. This function also attempts to store values as integers, floats, or booleans if it is able to.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read property-value data from.

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties(java.lang.String relativePath)
        Clears the current property-value data and replaces it with the newly read data from the given file.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - the relative path to the file to read property-value data from.

      • getProperty

        public <T> T getProperty(java.lang.String property)
        Gets the value for the property with the given name from the current property data. Returns null if the property key does not exist in the current property-value data.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value's type
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property
        Returns:
        the value that corresponds to the given property.

      • getPropertyMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getPropertyMap()
        Gets the current property-value map.
        Returns:
        the current property-value map.
